attributes.action: Give 99 year old Tom Moore a honour in the next honours list.
attributes.additional_details: Because Tom Moore deserves to be recognised for the work he has done.
attributes.background: 99 years old Tom Moore has raised over £8.5m to support the NHS. This deserves recognition he should be awarded an honour by the Queen.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
